#labels Featured
<wiki:comment>#summary ChangeLog</wiki:comment>

FindTBB does not have releases, but instead can be obtained directly from [http://code.google.com/p/findtbb/source/checkout SVN].
Consequently, instead of version numbers, revision numbers are referenced here.

= Changes =
*r36* (2011May24)<br />
Several improvements, many small fixes.
  * Now defines TBB_DEBUG_LIBRARY_DIRS, too
  * Support for MSVC10
  * Better support on MacOS
  * More search paths
  * Many small bug fixes
  * License included in file
See issue #1 or commit message :) (thanks to Jiri Marsik)

*r35* (2011May24)<br />
Added define of TBB_INTERFACE_VERSION (thx to facebook).

*r24* (2011Feb10)<br />
Added compatibility with commercially aligned distribution for Mac OS X (thanks to Gino van den Bergen)

*r17* (2010May28)<br />
Added support for TBB 3.0 (thanks to Florian Uhlig)

*r15* (2009Apr24)<br />
Added support for the environment variable TBB_ARCH_PLATFORM (thanks to Gino van den Bergen)

*r2* (2009Jan21)<br />
Initial version
